title: Python Basics
whatILearned: Mastered Python fundamentals including data structures, loops, functions, and basic object-oriented programming concepts. Gained hands-on experience with problem-solving techniques.

title: CSS Basics
whatILearned: Mastered CSS fundamentals including selectors, box model, flexbox, grid layout, and responsive design principles. Gained hands-on experience with styling web pages.

title: JavaScript Basics
whatILearned: Mastered JavaScript fundamentals including variables, data types, functions, DOM manipulation, and event handling. Gained hands-on experience with interactive web development.

title: JavaScript Intermediate
whatILearned: Mastered Intermediate JavaScript concepts including asynchronous programming, closures, and ES6 features. Gained hands-on experience with building interactive web applications.

title: MySQL Basics
whatILearned: Fundamentals of SQL including data retrieval, filtering, sorting, and basic aggregation. Gained hands-on experience with database management and query optimization.

title: MySQL Intermediate
whatILearned: Intermediate SQL concepts including complex queries, joins, subqueries, and data manipulation. Gained hands-on experience with database normalization and indexing techniques.

title: MySQL Advanced
whatILearned: Advanced SQL queries, database design principles, indexing strategies, performance optimization, and complex join operations. Mastered stored procedures and triggers.

title: C
whatILearned: Mastered C programming fundamentals including data types, control structures, functions, and pointers. Gained hands-on experience with memory management and low-level programming.

title: C++
whatILearned: Mastered C++ programming fundamentals including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms. Gained hands-on experience with STL (Standard Template Library) and memory management.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms in C++
whatILearned: Mastered advanced data structures (trees, graphs, heaps) and algorithm optimization techniques. Mastered time and space complexity analysis with competitive programming skills.

title: Java
whatILearned: Mastered Java programming fundamentals including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms. Gained hands-on experience with Java Collections Framework and concurrency.

title: Responsive Web Design
whatILearned: Mastered responsive web design principles including HTML5, CSS3, and accessibility standards. Gained hands-on experience with building mobile-friendly web applications.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
whatILearned: Mastered full-stack web development including front-end and back-end technologies. Gained hands-on experience with building dynamic web applications using modern frameworks and libraries. Mastered RESTful API design and integration. Learned about Web3 technologies, blockchain integration, and building decentralized applications (DApps).

title: Graphic Design Masterclass
whatILearned: Mastered graphic design principles including typography, color theory, and layout design. Gained hands-on experience with industry-standard design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign. Learned about creating visually appealing designs for print and digital media.

title: MERN with Gen AI
whatILearned: Mastered full-stack web development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with a focus on integrating Generative AI technologies. Gained hands-on experience with building scalable web applications, implementing JWT authentication, and utilizing Git and GitHub for version control. Learned about AI integration techniques to enhance user experiences in web applications. SCRUM and Agile methodologies for project management.
